siteMetadata.name: Jonathan Paynter
siteMetadata.title: Jonathan Paynter | Undergraduate Electronic and Information Engineer
siteMetadata.description: 4th year undergraduate Electronic and Information Engineer at Imperial College London.
siteMetadata.about:
I am a 4th year undergraduate student studying Electronic and Information Engineering.
              Pre-lockdown my interests were hiking, running, climbing and swimming, all I hope to resume shortly.
              I am interested in all elements of AI, but specifically I'd like to continue in reinforcement learning, and AI in social science.

projects.name: Fake News Detector web app
projects.description: Developed during the 2020 IC Hack Hackathon, queried articles are embedded using a language model and compared against similar articles scraped from Google. A score is generated from the articles similarity, factoring in its publish date to account for novel articles.

projects.name: SimMIPS
projects.description: A simulator for the MIPS 1 ISA

projects.name: Pool shot prediction
projects.description: Algorithm on FPGA to show in real time the trajectory of a pool shot, leveraging calibrated colours of key points on the pool table and cue.

projects.name: Mastermind Playing Algorithm
projects.description: Solving the game of "Mastermind" up to code lengths of 15 using an adaptive combination of a particle swarm algorithm, a genetic algorithm and minimax, depending on length.

experience.name: Research Placement at Imperial College
experience.description: Working to create a learnable Bayesian updating model for use in robotic manipulation. March 2020 - present

experience.name: Mindsheet Ltd.
experience.description: Data Analytics Consultant - modelling natural language identifiers. December 2020 (1 week)

experience.name: ARM
experience.description: Software Engineering Intern, Python. Summer 2020 (3 months)

skills.name: Languages and Frameworks
skills.description: Python (PyTorch, Tensorflow), C++, Prolog, SQL, LabVIEW
